text:
Me and Peter get the follwoing error while publsihing a doc. I only get the
problem on the demo server (official IP). It works for me locally. I used Cocoon
2.1.6

Stack trace:

text:
More Stack trace. Is the ProxyGenerator the problem ??

creator: roku@apache.org

text:
On the demo server, this error was caused by a wrong IP setting in /etc/hosts.
This caused the IP to be resolved from the external network correct, but it
failed for resovling the hosts's IP internally.

So Peter, watch out.
creator: roku@apache.org

text:
Indeed, whilst the domain name is fully resolvable to the correct IP address, if
using a utility such as lynx I cannot view lenya internally  using the domain name.

A change to /etc/hosts so that the domain name resolves to the internal IP
address of the box works. Not sure about why this is the problem just yet.

Good spot.
creator: ps@nomensa.com
